data.system_settings: iOS 10.3.2b5  Discord version 1.8.5 - iPhone 6sPlus using iCloud Photo Library with optimize phone storage.
data.short_description: Cropping and using markup on a photo causes it to crash the app when uploading while iCloud Photo Library is on
data.steps_to_repro: - have iCloud Photo Library on (optimize phone storage) - crop any photo - use markup to add anything to the photo - attempt to upload the photo with the clip icon - photo will not show up on the quick picker and must be selected from camera roll - add a description - click send - crash
